item.title: Causal vs. Anticausal merging of predictors
item.description: Causal assumptions drastically alter predictor merging, with CMAXENT revealing logistic regression for causal and LDA for anticausal directions.

item.title: Sample-Efficient Agnostic Boosting
item.description: Agnostic boosting gets a major efficiency upgrade! A new algorithm leverages sample reuse to drastically reduce the data needed for accurate learning, closing the gap with computationally expensive al…
